body.p:
Louisville Oct 2d 1865
Cal Jacob
Dear Sir

One of my friends Mr John Nevin a has sent a petition to Gov Bramlette to have a fine remitted for carrying a concealed weapon, I board with his Mother and have Known Mr Nevin for years as a quiet nice young man and this is a Rest spite &c I hope you may do Something in his behalf as your influence is far better than a string of petitioners here, any influence you use to have the fine remitted will be fully appreciated not only by Mr Nevin but also by your friend and obt Svt
